name: Mono Lith
description:
This short prototype game was created for an NSLC exhibition, which is like a game jam but way more chill and wasn't a competition. The people that worked on this were Hayden Hogen-Esch, Kaiyung Sun, Carlos Perez, and Isaac. Hayden Hogen-Esch has a couple of other projects in the works, they'll eventually be up @ https://reroka-studios.itch.io/.

Background music:

Hey No Loitering by Major Label Interest & Cory Clark
